akas: Celebrities y sus experiencias paranormales Spain
akas from release info: Celebrities y sus experiencias paranormales Spain

1.title: Jillian Barberie/Dan Cortese/Bruce Boxleitner
1.plot: Jillian is reunited with her birth parents and discovers the origins of the ghost who visited her throughout her childhood; his life in a downward spiral, Dan Cortese gets some help from the other side; actor Bruce Boxleitner comes face to face with a ghost who met a tragic fate.

2.title: Joanna Cassidy, Linda Dano, Michael Madsen, Rae Dawn Chong
2.plot: Michael Madsen has a terrifying encounter with the paranormal while visiting a hotel in Texas; a frightened Linda Dano discovers she is sharing her new home with a child spirit; actress Joanna Cassidy finds a secret tunnel underneath her home that has a tragic history; while attending the Cannes film festival actress Rae Dawn Chong is accosted by a disturbed entity who inhabits the mansion she is staying in.

3.title: Andy Dick/Justin Henry/Nick Turturro/Betsey Johnson
3.plot: While exploring the wilds of California, comedian Andy Dick discovered an abandoned homestead guarded by a long-dead pioneer with hatred for trespassers; shooting on location at an abandoned insane asylum, Justin Henry is lured into a lair of ghost children; Nick Turturro witnesses an unexplainable event that confirms his belief in the power of true love; while taking a break from her fast-paced life in New York City, fashion-designer Betsey Johnson is visited by a dear loved one from the other side.

4.title: Cherie Currie/Joseph Bologna/Diane Farr/Estella Warren
4.plot: Singer Cherie Currie is possessed by a terrifying evil entity who transforms her into a violent teenager; actor Joseph Bologna is frightened to death when he is visited by his grandmother who had recently passed; actress Diane Farr comes face to face with an unhappy spirit when she decided to move away; Estella Warren's mother is distressed when a young Estella befriends a spirit whose life came to a violent end.

5.title: Jim Norton/Penny Johnson/Peter Scolari/Steve Williams
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Marlee Matlin/Kim Carnes/Robert Carradine
6.plot: Academy Award-winning actress Marlee Matlin has a powerful and moving experience as she loses a loved one; singer/songwriter Kim Carnes finds her muse in the spirit of a young girl who once inhabited her home; Robert Carradine sees a ghost who had a tragic ending while living in an old manor house in Ireland.

7.title: Downtown Julie Brown/Drita D'Avanzo/Jai Rodriguez/Nicholas Brendon
7.plot:
Know what this is about?

9.title: Mary Lynn Rajskub/Dennis Christopher/Barbara Steele/Gary Daniels
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Louis Gossett Jr/Carolyn Hennesy/Nathan Morris/Kevin Nash
10.plot: While filming on location in Louisiana, Louis Gossett Jr. is attacked by a terrifying band of violent ghosts. Actress Carolyn Hennesy is relieved of the suffering caused by her emotional turmoil after a visit from a deceased loved one. Musician Nathan Morris quickly discovers his street smarts are no match for a ghost that met a tragic end. Professional wrestler Kevin Nash is comforted by the spirit of his mother.

11.title: Julie White/Roger Bart/Dominique Swain/Thomas Ian Nicholas
11.plot: Julie White is terribly shaken by a spirit she encounters backstage in a theater; after buying a new home in the country, actor Roger Bart's peaceful existence is shattered by the presence of a deranged ghost; actress Dominique Swain brings an antique chair into her home and unbeknownst to her, there is a vengeful spirit attached to it; while filming a horror movie in a remote cabin in the woods, actor Thomas Ian Nicholas and his crew are terrorized by an unseen entity.

0.title: Episode #1.0
0.plot: Gina Gershon, Ernie Hudson, Sammy Hagar, and Belinda Carlisle share their encounters with the paranormal.

1.title: Scott Baio/Joan Rivers/Teri Polo/David Carradine
1.plot: Joan Rivers asks a voodoo priestess to help her with an angry ghost; Scott Baio's unresolved issues with his father haunt him when his dad dies; Teri Polo has a horrifying encounter one night when she's just 8 years old; and David Carradine has a strange encounter with his wife's dead husband.

2.title: Celebrity Ghost Stories (Carnie Wilson, Eric Roberts, Elisabeth Rohm, C. Thomas Howell)
2.plot: When Barry Williams holds a memorial service for his father, a few strange "happenings" make the day even more unforgettable; Debi Mazer gets a hostile welcome from a ghost when she moves into a friend's home; Greg Grunberg meets a ghost with a shocking past; and Sammy Hagar gets a visit from Van Halen's dead manager.

3.title: Carrie Fisher/John Waters/Rue McClanahan/F Castelluccio
3.plot: Carrie Fisher has a spooky experience after her best friend dies in her bed; John Waters still remembers a scary night in the woods back in the 1950s; Rue McClanahan asks her best friend, on his deathbed, to come back and contact her; and Federico Castelluccio thinks he's all alone in his workshop while working on a painting--but someone's watching.

4.title: Tom Arnold/Nia Long/Carni Wilson/Dee Snider
4.plot: Tom Arnold takes his teenage anger out on a pipe organ, angering a revengeful spirit; Dee Snider's murdered brother-in-law has a message from the grave; Carnie Wilson's sister inadvertently introduces her to the spirit world; and Nia Long has a shocking experience on the eve of her grandfather's death.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Lisa Rinna's family is haunted by a lonely ghost seeking a family of her own; Vincent Curatola rediscovers his mother's love after she dies; Jeffrey Ross's high-flying lifestyle is brought down to earth by a strange haunting; and Illeana Douglas's new apartment comes with a surprise.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: A spirit makes Justine Bateman's life a lot merrier; Jay Thomas mistakenly uses stones taken from a tombstone for a home renovation and pays a price; Traci Lords has a life-saving run-in with a miner's ghost; and James Kyson Lee opens the door to a hellish nightmare when he reads an underground ghost magazine.

8.title: Ali Landry, Gina Gershon, Ernie Hudson, Kelly Carlson, Anson Williams
8.plot: Anson Williams gets help from the world beyond after a terrible car accident; Kelly Carlson is bullied by six violent spirits; Gina Gershon experiences a strange presence in a college dorm; Ernie Hudson agrees to stay at a haunted hotel while promoting his movie, Ghostbusters; and Ali Landry gets an unbelievable phone call on the eve of a family tragedy.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: A young Morgan Fairchild is abused by a spirit when she moves into her new husband's family home; an unidentifiable stranger comes to John Salley's aid during a nightclub shooting; Lili Taylor hears unexplained noises when she goes on retreat with her acting troupe; and Vincent Curatola communicates with his dead father.

1.title: Regis Philbin/Jaime King/Harry Hamlin/Ana Gasteyer
1.plot: Regis Philbin spends a terrifying night in a notorious haunted house trying to coax its ghosts into sight; Harry Hamlin's wedding proposal is foiled by a ghost with a broken heart; Ana Gasteyer comes face-to-face with tragic spirits in a theater; and model and movie star Jaime King is attacked by an evil entity in her family's country home.

2.title: Bret Michaels, Natasha Henstridge, Penelope Ann Miller, Eva Amurri
2.plot: Faced with a decision that would change his life, Bret Michaels is visited by a close relative who points him toward his destiny; followed by a mysterious entity Natasha Henstridge is terrified when it manifests itself in her new home; as a child Penelope Ann Miller is met by her grandmother shortly after her death.

3.title: Jerry Stiller, Mindy McCready, Nick Hogan, Lourdes Benedicto
3.plot: Jerry Stiller receives a long awaited message from his father; a maternal figure appears to Mindy McCready at one of the darkest moments of her life; Nick Hogan breaks into the forbidden floor of an old hotel and discovers its violent past; and Lourdes Benedicto encounters a lingering spirit who refuses to leave her childhood home.

4.title: Valerie Harper/Mindy Cohn/Matthew Gray Gubler/Nicole Eggert
4.plot: Looking for the perfect sanctuary to finish her book, Mindy Cohn is confronted with anything but solitude at a famous Pasadena apartment building; while at a crossroads in her career, a young Valerie Harper comes face to face with a ghostly debutant who points her in the right direction; Matthew Gray Gubler experiences a haunting in an eccentric Hollywood apartment building with a tragic past.

5.title: Keshia Knight Pulliam, Ming-Na, Chi McBride, Mia Tyler
5.plot: Keisha Knight Pulliam encounters a lingering family spirit; while making renovations on her new house, Ming-Na discovers a previous owner is reluctant to leave; during one of the darkest moments of his life, Chi McBride is sent a message of hope from a powerful political figure who had an untimely death; Mia Tyler is visited by a guardian spirit when her relationship turns sour.

6.title: Brett Butler/Phil Varone/Ana Gasteyer/Cassandra Peterson
6.plot: A protective spirit saves Brett Butler from an abusive relationship; a murdered man threatens Cassandra Peterson's life in her own home; lonely spirits stalk Phil Varone in his Los Angeles mansion; and Ana Gasteyer inadvertently summons the former residents of a historic hotel to her suite.

7.title: Beverly D'Angelo/Sally Struthers/Melissa George
7.plot: Beverly D'Angelo invokes Cass Elliot's spirit in her new home; Sally Struthers is visited by the apparition of a woman who fell tragically to her death in her home; and Melissa George is chastised by the incarnation of evil energy during the filming of The Amityville Horror.

8.title: Loretta Lynn
8.plot: Country music superstar Loretta Lynn, the "Queen of Country," invites viewers into her legendary, and HAUNTED, Tennessee estate. In this exclusive and highly personal special, world-renowned medium Kim Russo travels to Loretta's home to reveal the darkest and most surprising details of this true-life Celebrity Ghost Story.

21.title: George Wendt/Wayne Newton/Ace Frehley
21.plot: George and his family spend a tortuous night in a cottage haunted by Native Americans and bootleggers; Wayne Newton is paid a surprise visit by the ghost of his dear friend Elvis Presley while performing in Las Vegas.

22.title: Marisa Ramirez/Jimmie Walker/Lisa Vidal/Kate Vernon
22.plot: Bloody visions of a violent tragedy haunt Marisa's childhood; Jimmie runs out of gas on an icy, North Dakota road and encounters a mysterious apparition; a close friend of Lisa's dies violently and returns from the other side.

23.title: Shar Jackson/Blair Brown/Esai Morales/John Hensley
23.plot: Shar discovers the body of her friend after he inexplicably commits suicide and soon discovers the shocking truth behind the tragedy; Blair and her family are menaced by the violent spirit of an insane man.

24.title: Coco/Craig Kilborn/Diana DeGarmo/Tommy Davidson
24.plot: A lost male spirit obsessed with Coco attacks her and threatens her life; Craig Kilborn encounters a murderous spirit who kills harmless animals; Diana's brother plays with a spirit board and invites a dark spirit into their home.

25.title: Tom Green/Brenda Epperson/Anthony Michael Hall/Jacklyn Zeman
25.plot: Tom gets more than what he bargained for when he stays overnight in a haunted museum; while recording a record, Anthony is visited by a spirit who has recently crossed over.

26.title: Richard Grieco/Ana Ortiz/Barry Bostwick
26.plot: Richard dabbles in the dark arts and pays a horrifying price; after a friend is killed in a tragic car accident, she visits Anthony one last time to say farewell; Ana is preyed upon in a home with a murderous past.

27.title: Nadine Velazquez/Burt Ward/Adrianna Costa/Bruce Davison
27.plot: Nadine is tormented by an evil entity that was mauled to death in her home; Burt stays overnight in a remote inn and encounters the ghosts of the criminally insane; a lost ring leads Adrianna to her true love and her grandfather's watchful spirit.

5.title: Jim Norton, Penny Johnson, Peter Scolari, Steven Williams
5.plot: While staying in a Las Vegas hotel suite, comedian Jim Norton encounters a spirit brutally killed by the mob years before; actress Penny Johnson is attacked by a demon that feeds on the pain and vulnerability of young women.

imdb.title: Celebrity Ghost Stories
plot: Celebrities talk about paranormal experiences that they've had.
